MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA5 Burtonwood area of Warrington affecting properties in Fairclough Street, Mercer Street, Haley Road South and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 7:05am. Restoration is taking longer than expected because of a suspected underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12 noon. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:33am on 2nd February 2021.
